entry.title: Cut and Run
entry.summary:
Author: Bubbling24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,201Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 90

Summary: In a city like Gotham, information is currency. And you've made a career out of getting people to talk.Not by force. Not with threats. Just a salon chair, a mirror, and the kind of silence that makes people fill it with secrets. Affairs. Deals. Who’s moving into which block. Who’s gone missing. Who’s about to.You’re not a vigilante. You don’t wear a mask. You just know when something’s about to crack - and lately, Gotham’s been humming like a live wire.And you weren’t supposed to matter. Not to anyone.And especially not to the man who just blew up a bar because you said it gave you a bad feeling.

entry.title: The House hunger built
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,647Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 72

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind. [M/N] [L/N]; Mortitan, brilliant, a chef of his own making and conisear of flesh.All Jason needed to do is sweeten the deal in a way that drives all people, after all at the end of the day {M/N] is human after all."Besides..it's people...they are literally born every day..so who cares if a few of them...just disapear once in a while?"

entry.title: Contemptible
entry.summary:
Author: mise_rei

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,568Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

Summary: “Contemptible?”“Please, my father’s contemptible. Just call me Cont,” You smirked.Nolan Grayson’s very human daughter suddenly starts developing her powers late in life. A lot later than her younger brother, Invincible, that is. You were always a late bloomer anyway, and an acquired taste at that. One that Jason Todd was maybe a big fan of.More of an original character than an x reader tbh

entry.title: May a Thousand Blossoms Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: ovenbaked_seasalt_cracker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,123Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Being a flower nymph who stays in the wooded meadow you were born, it isn't everyday you come face-to-face with a man, much less one that crash lands in your forest...-Finding himself banned from Gotham, Jason the God of Destruction finds himself waking up in a Lonely Forest far from civilisation and stripped of his godly powers. He soon finds himself welcomed into a world filled with Nymphs, and mythical creatures. Will he find a budding love? How will he get his godhood back? All he knows is that there is a semi-naked woman watching his every move as he nurses himself back to health in this meadow.-The first chapter/prologue is mainly setting up the world and Jason's exile. Reader involvement doesn't happen until chapter 2.Disclaimer!! The reader is written with the intention of being POC and chubby/not straight size

entry.title: Josie and the Pussycat
entry.summary:
Author: insert_cooler_username

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,329Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 758

Summary: “Got your letter,” he grumbles, coming closer, looming over your supine form. A mass of muscle and leather and anger. “Is that what you really want?”“What?” you snap out. “A divorce?” You scoff, shaking your head at him. “No, what I want is a husband that will actually come home and raise his kid like he promised. But instead I have someone who follows us around on rooftops and lurks in the shadows thinking he’s some silent protector and not a fucking deadbeat. So yeah, I’ll settle for a divorce. It’s the next best thing I have.”-Your husband left you before he could fuck things up. Too bad he still is when he appears in your life several years later, on the advent of your move from Gotham, and asks to meet his daughter. The past is a hard pill to swallow, but Josie deserves a dad. You just have to make sure you don't pussy out of seeing Jason again. Or, at least, that you don't kill each other.

entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,635Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 103

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all.What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway?In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel. Good thing he knows how to fuck.
